metadata.title: CVE-2022-33146 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Open redirect vulnerability in web2py versions prior to 2.22.5 allows aremote attacker to redirect a user to an arbitrary web site and conduct aphishing attack by having a user to access a specially crafted URL.

criterions.comment: web2py: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
